title: Discord Verification
body:
This is the verification discussion for discord reporting as per the discussion below:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/AvNOkP7L-11142016-discord-moderation

Post your discord tag here and type @moderators in the #verification channel. The moderators will cross check and approve you on the server. Make sure to follow the rules below as this feature is a privilege and will be removed if abused.

**Server Rules **
1. Always be respectful to Moderators and Rioters. Harassment and insults will not be tolerated.
2. Do not spam. Please.
3. This is a privilege and any abuse will result in a ban from using this service.
